metadata.description: A json-object parameter (keys and values) for tags for all resources in this deployment. Eg. { "Cost-center":, "ABC-123", "Environment": "Production" }

variables._help: This template is empty. But we need the parameters because its called conditionally. https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-resource-manager/resource-manager-template-best-practices#conditionally-link-to-nested-templates
